2708
2709/*!
2710 \reimp
2711*/
2712void QMenu::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e)
2713{
2714 Q_D(QMenu);
2715 d->updateActionRects();
2716 QStylePainter p(this);
2717 QRegion emptyArea = QRegion(rect());
2718
2719 QStyleOptionMenuItem menuOpt;
2720 menuOpt.initFrom(w: this);
2721 menuOpt.state = QStyle::State_None;
2722 menuOpt.checkType = QStyleOptionMenuItem::NotCheckable;
2723 menuOpt.maxIconWidth = 0;
2724 menuOpt.reservedShortcutWidth = 0;
2725 p.drawPrimitive(pe: QStyle::PE_PanelMenu, opt: menuOpt);
2726
2727 //calculate the scroll up / down rect
2728 const int fw = style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuPanelWidth, option: nullptr, widget: this);
2729 const int hmargin = style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuHMargin,option: nullptr, widget: this);
2730 const int vmargin = style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuVMargin, option: nullptr, widget: this);
2731
2732 QRect scrollUpRect, scrollDownRect;
2733 const int leftmargin = fw + hmargin + d->leftmargin;
2734 const int topmargin = fw + vmargin + d->topmargin;
2735 const int bottommargin = fw + vmargin + d->bottommargin;
2736 const int contentWidth = width() - (fw + hmargin) * 2 - d->leftmargin - d->rightmargin;
2737 if (d->scroll) {
2738 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp)
2739 scrollUpRect.setRect(ax: leftmargin, ay: topmargin, aw: contentWidth, ah: d->scrollerHeight());
2740
2741 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollDown)
2742 scrollDownRect.setRect(ax: leftmargin, ay: height() - d->scrollerHeight() - bottommargin,
2743 aw: contentWidth, ah: d->scrollerHeight());
2744 }
2745
2746 //calculate the tear off rect
2747 QRect tearOffRect;
2748 if (d->tearoff) {
2749 tearOffRect.setRect(ax: leftmargin, ay: topmargin, aw: contentWidth,
2750 ah: style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuTearoffHeight, option: nullptr, widget: this));
2751 if (d->scroll && d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp)
2752 tearOffRect.translate(dx: 0, dy: d->scrollerHeight());
2753 }
2754
2755 //draw the items that need updating..
2756 QRect scrollUpTearOffRect = scrollUpRect.united(r: tearOffRect);
2757 for (int i = 0; i < d->actions.size(); ++i) {
2758 QAction *action = d->actions.at(i);
2759 QRect actionRect = d->actionRects.at(i);
2760 if (!e->rect().intersects(r: actionRect)
2761 || d->widgetItems.value(key: action))
2762 continue;
2763 //set the clip region to be extra safe (and adjust for the scrollers)
2764 emptyArea -= QRegion(actionRect);
2765
2766 QRect adjustedActionRect = actionRect;
2767 if (!scrollUpTearOffRect.isEmpty() && adjustedActionRect.bottom() <= scrollUpTearOffRect.top())
2768 continue;
2769
2770 if (!scrollDownRect.isEmpty() && adjustedActionRect.top() >= scrollDownRect.bottom())
2771 continue;
2772
2773 if (adjustedActionRect.intersects(r: scrollUpTearOffRect)) {
2774 if (adjustedActionRect.bottom() <= scrollUpTearOffRect.bottom())
2775 continue;
2776 else
2777 adjustedActionRect.setTop(scrollUpTearOffRect.bottom()+1);
2778 }
2779
2780 if (adjustedActionRect.intersects(r: scrollDownRect)) {
2781 if (adjustedActionRect.top() >= scrollDownRect.top())
2782 continue;
2783 else
2784 adjustedActionRect.setBottom(scrollDownRect.top()-1);
2785 }
2786
2787 QRegion adjustedActionReg(adjustedActionRect);
2788 p.setClipRegion(adjustedActionReg);
2789
2790 QStyleOptionMenuItem opt;
2791 initStyleOption(option: &opt, action);
2792 opt.rect = actionRect;
2793 p.drawControl(ce: QStyle::CE_MenuItem, opt);
2794 }
2795
2796 emptyArea -= QRegion(scrollUpTearOffRect);
2797 emptyArea -= QRegion(scrollDownRect);
2798
2799 if (d->scrollUpTearOffItem || d->scrollDownItem) {
2800 if (d->scrollUpTearOffItem)
2801 d->scrollUpTearOffItem->updateScrollerRects(rect: scrollUpTearOffRect);
2802 if (d->scrollDownItem)
2803 d->scrollDownItem->updateScrollerRects(rect: scrollDownRect);
2804 } else {
2805 //paint scroll up /down
2806 d->drawScroller(painter: &p, type: QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem::ScrollUp, rect: scrollUpRect);
2807 d->drawScroller(painter: &p, type: QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem::ScrollDown, rect: scrollDownRect);
2808 //paint the tear off..
2809 d->drawTearOff(painter: &p, rect: tearOffRect);
2810 }
2811
2812 //draw border
2813 if (fw) {
2814 QRegion borderReg;
2815 borderReg += QRect(0, 0, fw, height()); //left
2816 borderReg += QRect(width()-fw, 0, fw, height()); //right
2817 borderReg += QRect(0, 0, width(), fw); //top
2818 borderReg += QRect(0, height()-fw, width(), fw); //bottom
2819 p.setClipRegion(borderReg);
2820 emptyArea -= borderReg;
2821 QStyleOptionFrame frame;
2822 frame.rect = rect();
2823 frame.palette = palette();
2824 frame.state = QStyle::State_None;
2825 frame.lineWidth = style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuPanelWidth, option: &frame);
2826 frame.midLineWidth = 0;
2827 p.drawPrimitive(pe: QStyle::PE_FrameMenu, opt: frame);
2828 }
2829
2830 //finally the rest of the spaces
2831 p.setClipRegion(emptyArea);
2832 menuOpt.state = QStyle::State_None;
2833 menuOpt.menuItemType = QStyleOptionMenuItem::EmptyArea;
2834 menuOpt.checkType = QStyleOptionMenuItem::NotCheckable;
2835 menuOpt.rect = rect();
2836 menuOpt.menuRect = rect();
2837 p.drawControl(ce: QStyle::CE_MenuEmptyArea, opt: menuOpt);
2838}

2853/*!
2854 \reimp
2855*/
2856void QMenu::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2857{
2858 Q_D(QMenu);
2859 if (d->aboutToHide || d->mouseEventTaken(e))
2860 return;
2861 // Workaround for XCB on multiple screens which doesn't have offset. If the menu is open on one screen
2862 // and mouse clicks on second screen, e->pos() is QPoint(0,0) and the menu doesn't hide. This trick makes
2863 // possible to hide the menu when mouse clicks on another screen (e->screenPos() returns correct value).
2864 // Only when mouse clicks in QPoint(0,0) on second screen, the menu doesn't hide.
2865 if ((e->position().toPoint().isNull() && !e->globalPosition().isNull()) || !rect().contains(p: e->position().toPoint())) {
2866 if (d->noReplayFor
2867 && QRect(d->noReplayFor->mapToGlobal(QPoint()), d->noReplayFor->size()).contains(p: e->globalPosition().toPoint()))
2868 setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMouseReplay);
2869 if (d->eventLoop) // synchronous operation
2870 d->syncAction = nullptr;
2871 d->hideUpToMenuBar();
2872 return;
2873 }
2874 QMenuPrivate::mouseDown = this;
2875
2876 QAction *action = d->actionAt(p: e->position().toPoint());
2877 d->setCurrentAction(action, popup: 20);
2878 update();
2879}
2880
2881/*!
2882 \reimp
2883*/
2884void QMenu::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2885{
2886 Q_D(QMenu);
2887 if (d->aboutToHide || d->mouseEventTaken(e))
2888 return;
2889 if (QMenuPrivate::mouseDown != this) {
2890 QMenuPrivate::mouseDown = nullptr;
2891 return;
2892 }
2893
2894 QMenuPrivate::mouseDown = nullptr;
2895 d->setSyncAction();
2896 QAction *action = d->actionAt(p: e->position().toPoint());
2897
2898 if (action && action == d->currentAction) {
2899 if (!action->menu()) {
2900#if defined(Q_OS_WIN)
2901 //On Windows only context menus can be activated with the right button
2902 if (e->button() == Qt::LeftButton || d->topCausedWidget() == 0)
2903#endif
2904 d->activateAction(action, action_e: QAction::Trigger);
2905 }
2906 } else if ((!action || action->isEnabled()) && d->hasMouseMoved(globalPos: e->globalPosition().toPoint())) {
2907 d->hideUpToMenuBar();
2908 }
2909}

2911/*!
2912 \reimp
2913*/
2914void QMenu::changeEvent(QEvent *e)
2915{
2916 Q_D(QMenu);
2917 if (e->type() == QEvent::StyleChange || e->type() == QEvent::FontChange ||
2918 e->type() == QEvent::LayoutDirectionChange) {
2919 d->itemsDirty = 1;
2920 setMouseTracking(style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_MouseTracking, opt: nullptr, widget: this));
2921 if (isVisible())
2922 resize(sizeHint());
2923 if (!style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_Scrollable, opt: nullptr, widget: this)) {
2924 delete d->scroll;
2925 d->scroll = nullptr;
2926 } else if (!d->scroll) {
2927 d->scroll = new QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller;
2928 d->scroll->scrollFlags = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollNone;
2929 }
2930 } else if (e->type() == QEvent::EnabledChange) {
2931 if (d->tornPopup) // torn-off menu
2932 d->tornPopup->setEnabled(isEnabled());
2933 d->menuAction->setEnabled(isEnabled());
2934 if (!d->platformMenu.isNull())
2935 d->platformMenu->setEnabled(isEnabled());
2936 }
2937 QWidget::changeEvent(e);
2938}

2941/*!
2942 \reimp
2943*/
2944bool QMenu::event(QEvent *e)
2945{
2946 Q_D(QMenu);
2947 switch (e->type()) {
2948 case QEvent::Polish:
2949 d->updateLayoutDirection();
2950 break;
2951 case QEvent::ShortcutOverride: {
2952 QKeyEvent *kev = static_cast<QKeyEvent *>(e);
2953 if (kev->key() == Qt::Key_Up || kev->key() == Qt::Key_Down
2954 || kev->key() == Qt::Key_Left || kev->key() == Qt::Key_Right
2955 || kev->key() == Qt::Key_Enter || kev->key() == Qt::Key_Return
2956#ifndef QT_NO_SHORTCUT
2957 || kev->matches(key: QKeySequence::Cancel)
2958#endif
2959 ) {
2960 e->accept();
2961 return true;
2962 }
2963 }
2964 break;
2965 case QEvent::KeyPress: {
2966 QKeyEvent *ke = static_cast<QKeyEvent *>(e);
2967 if (ke->key() == Qt::Key_Tab || ke->key() == Qt::Key_Backtab) {
2968 keyPressEvent(ke);
2969 return true;
2970 }
2971 } break;
2972 case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
2973 case QEvent::ContextMenu: {
2974 bool canPopup = true;
2975 if (e->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress)
2976 canPopup = (static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(e)->button() == Qt::LeftButton);
2977 if (canPopup && d->delayState.timer.isActive()) {
2978 d->delayState.stop();
2979 internalDelayedPopup();
2980 }
2981 }
2982 break;
2983 case QEvent::Resize: {
2984 QStyleHintReturnMask menuMask;
2985 QStyleOption option;
2986 option.initFrom(w: this);
2987 if (style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_Mask, opt: &option, widget: this, returnData: &menuMask)) {
2988 setMask(menuMask.region);
2989 }
2990 d->itemsDirty = 1;
2991 d->updateActionRects();
2992 break; }
2993 case QEvent::Show:
2994 QMenuPrivate::mouseDown = nullptr;
2995 d->updateActionRects();
2996 d->sloppyState.reset();
2997 if (d->currentAction)
2998 d->popupAction(action: d->currentAction, delay: 0, activateFirst: false);
2999 if (isWindow() && window() && window()->windowHandle() && !window()->windowHandle()->transientParent())
3000 window()->windowHandle()->setTransientParent(d->transientParentWindow());
3001 break;
3002#if QT_CONFIG(tooltip)
3003 case QEvent::ToolTip:
3004 if (d->toolTipsVisible) {
3005 const QHelpEvent *ev = static_cast<const QHelpEvent*>(e);
3006 if (const QAction *action = actionAt(pt: ev->pos())) {
3007 const QString toolTip = action->d_func()->tooltip;
3008 if (!toolTip.isEmpty())
3009 QToolTip::showText(pos: ev->globalPos(), text: toolTip, w: this);
3010 else
3011 QToolTip::hideText();
3012 return true;
3013 }
3014 }
3015 break;
3016#endif // QT_CONFIG(tooltip)
3017#if QT_CONFIG(whatsthis)
3018 case QEvent::QueryWhatsThis:
3019 e->setAccepted(d->whatsThis.size());
3020 if (QAction *action = d->actionAt(p: static_cast<QHelpEvent*>(e)->pos())) {
3021 if (action->whatsThis().size() || action->menu())
3022 e->accept();
3023 }
3024 return true;
3025#endif
3026 default:
3027 break;
3028 }
3029 return QWidget::event(event: e);
3030}

3042
3043/*!
3044 \reimp
3045*/
3046void QMenu::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *e)
3047{
3048 Q_D(QMenu);
3049 d->updateActionRects();
3050 int key = e->key();
3051 if (isRightToLeft()) { // in reverse mode open/close key for submenues are reversed
3052 if (key == Qt::Key_Left)
3053 key = Qt::Key_Right;
3054 else if (key == Qt::Key_Right)
3055 key = Qt::Key_Left;
3056 }
3057#ifndef Q_OS_MAC
3058 if (key == Qt::Key_Tab) //means down
3059 key = Qt::Key_Down;
3060 if (key == Qt::Key_Backtab) //means up
3061 key = Qt::Key_Up;
3062#endif
3063
3064 bool key_consumed = false;
3065 switch(key) {
3066 case Qt::Key_Home:
3067 key_consumed = true;
3068 if (d->scroll)
3069 d->scrollMenu(location: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollTop, active: true);
3070 break;
3071 case Qt::Key_End:
3072 key_consumed = true;
3073 if (d->scroll)
3074 d->scrollMenu(location: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollBottom, active: true);
3075 break;
3076 case Qt::Key_PageUp:
3077 key_consumed = true;
3078 if (d->currentAction && d->scroll) {
3079 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp)
3080 d->scrollMenu(direction: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp, page: true, active: true);
3081 else
3082 d->scrollMenu(location: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollTop, active: true);
3083 }
3084 break;
3085 case Qt::Key_PageDown:
3086 key_consumed = true;
3087 if (d->currentAction && d->scroll) {
3088 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollDown)
3089 d->scrollMenu(direction: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollDown, page: true, active: true);
3090 else
3091 d->scrollMenu(location: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollBottom, active: true);
3092 }
3093 break;
3094 case Qt::Key_Up:
3095 case Qt::Key_Down: {
3096 key_consumed = true;
3097 QAction *nextAction = nullptr;
3098 QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollLocation scroll_loc = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollStay;
3099 if (!d->currentAction) {
3100 if (key == Qt::Key_Down) {
3101 for(int i = 0; i < d->actions.size(); ++i) {
3102 QAction *act = d->actions.at(i);
3103 if (d->actionRects.at(i).isNull())
3104 continue;
3105 if (!act->isSeparator() &&
3106 (style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_AllowActiveAndDisabled, opt: nullptr, widget: this)
3107 || act->isEnabled())) {
3108 nextAction = act;
3109 break;
3110 }
3111 }
3112 } else {
3113 for(int i = d->actions.size()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
3114 QAction *act = d->actions.at(i);
3115 if (d->actionRects.at(i).isNull())
3116 continue;
3117 if (!act->isSeparator() &&
3118 (style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_AllowActiveAndDisabled, opt: nullptr, widget: this)
3119 || act->isEnabled())) {
3120 nextAction = act;
3121 break;
3122 }
3123 }
3124 }
3125 } else {
3126 for(int i = 0, y = 0; !nextAction && i < d->actions.size(); i++) {
3127 QAction *act = d->actions.at(i);
3128 if (act == d->currentAction) {
3129 if (key == Qt::Key_Up) {
3130 for(int next_i = i-1; true; next_i--) {
3131 if (next_i == -1) {
3132 if (!style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_SelectionWrap, opt: nullptr, widget: this))
3133 break;
3134 if (d->scroll)
3135 scroll_loc = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollBottom;
3136 next_i = d->actionRects.size()-1;
3137 }
3138 QAction *next = d->actions.at(i: next_i);
3139 if (next == d->currentAction)
3140 break;
3141 if (d->actionRects.at(i: next_i).isNull())
3142 continue;
3143 if (next->isSeparator() ||
3144 (!next->isEnabled() &&
3145 !style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_AllowActiveAndDisabled, opt: nullptr, widget: this)))
3146 continue;
3147 nextAction = next;
3148 if (d->scroll && (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp)) {
3149 int topVisible = d->scrollerHeight();
3150 if (d->tearoff)
3151 topVisible += style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuTearoffHeight, option: nullptr, widget: this);
3152 if (((y + d->scroll->scrollOffset) - topVisible) <= d->actionRects.at(i: next_i).height())
3153 scroll_loc = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollTop;
3154 }
3155 break;
3156 }
3157 if (!nextAction && d->tearoff)
3158 d->tearoffHighlighted = 1;
3159 } else {
3160 y += d->actionRects.at(i).height();
3161 for(int next_i = i+1; true; next_i++) {
3162 if (next_i == d->actionRects.size()) {
3163 if (!style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_SelectionWrap, opt: nullptr, widget: this))
3164 break;
3165 if (d->scroll)
3166 scroll_loc = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollTop;
3167 next_i = 0;
3168 }
3169 QAction *next = d->actions.at(i: next_i);
3170 if (next == d->currentAction)
3171 break;
3172 if (d->actionRects.at(i: next_i).isNull())
3173 continue;
3174 if (next->isSeparator() ||
3175 (!next->isEnabled() &&
3176 !style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_AllowActiveAndDisabled, opt: nullptr, widget: this)))
3177 continue;
3178 nextAction = next;
3179 if (d->scroll && (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollDown)) {
3180 int bottomVisible = height() - d->scrollerHeight();
3181 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags & QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollUp)
3182 bottomVisible -= d->scrollerHeight();
3183 if (d->tearoff)
3184 bottomVisible -= style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_MenuTearoffHeight, option: nullptr, widget: this);
3185 if ((y + d->scroll->scrollOffset + d->actionRects.at(i: next_i).height()) > bottomVisible)
3186 scroll_loc = QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollBottom;
3187 }
3188 break;
3189 }
3190 }
3191 break;
3192 }
3193 y += d->actionRects.at(i).height();
3194 }
3195 }
3196 if (nextAction) {
3197 if (d->scroll && scroll_loc != QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollStay) {
3198 d->scroll->scrollTimer.stop();
3199 d->scrollMenu(action: nextAction, location: scroll_loc);
3200 }
3201 d->setCurrentAction(action: nextAction, /*popup*/-1, reason: QMenuPrivate::SelectedFromKeyboard);
3202 }
3203 break; }
3204
3205 case Qt::Key_Right:
3206 if (d->currentAction && d->currentAction->isEnabled() && d->currentAction->menu()) {
3207 d->popupAction(action: d->currentAction, delay: 0, activateFirst: true);
3208 key_consumed = true;
3209 break;
3210 }
3211 Q_FALLTHROUGH();
3212 case Qt::Key_Left: {
3213 if (d->currentAction && !d->scroll) {
3214 QAction *nextAction = nullptr;
3215 if (key == Qt::Key_Left) {
3216 QRect actionR = d->actionRect(act: d->currentAction);
3217 for(int x = actionR.left()-1; !nextAction && x >= 0; x--)
3218 nextAction = d->actionAt(p: QPoint(x, actionR.center().y()));
3219 } else {
3220 QRect actionR = d->actionRect(act: d->currentAction);
3221 for(int x = actionR.right()+1; !nextAction && x < width(); x++)
3222 nextAction = d->actionAt(p: QPoint(x, actionR.center().y()));
3223 }
3224 if (nextAction) {
3225 d->setCurrentAction(action: nextAction, /*popup*/-1, reason: QMenuPrivate::SelectedFromKeyboard);
3226 key_consumed = true;
3227 }
3228 }
3229 if (!key_consumed && key == Qt::Key_Left && qobject_cast<QMenu*>(object: d->causedPopup.widget)) {
3230 QPointer<QWidget> caused = d->causedPopup.widget;
3231 d->hideMenu(menu: this);
3232 if (caused)
3233 caused->setFocus();
3234 key_consumed = true;
3235 }
3236 break; }
3237
3238 case Qt::Key_Alt:
3239 if (d->tornoff)
3240 break;
3241
3242 key_consumed = true;
3243 if (style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_MenuBar_AltKeyNavigation, opt: nullptr, widget: this))
3244 {
3245 d->hideMenu(menu: this);
3246#if QT_CONFIG(menubar)
3247 if (QMenuBar *mb = qobject_cast<QMenuBar*>(object: QApplication::focusWidget())) {
3248 mb->d_func()->setKeyboardMode(false);
3249 }
3250#endif
3251 }
3252 break;
3253
3254 case Qt::Key_Space:
3255 if (!style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_SpaceActivatesItem, opt: nullptr, widget: this))
3256 break;
3257 // for motif, fall through
3258 Q_FALLTHROUGH();
3259#ifdef QT_KEYPAD_NAVIGATION
3260 case Qt::Key_Select:
3261#endif
3262 case Qt::Key_Return:
3263 case Qt::Key_Enter: {
3264 if (!d->currentAction) {
3265 d->setFirstActionActive();
3266 key_consumed = true;
3267 break;
3268 }
3269
3270 d->setSyncAction();
3271
3272 if (d->currentAction->menu())
3273 d->popupAction(action: d->currentAction, delay: 0, activateFirst: true);
3274 else
3275 d->activateAction(action: d->currentAction, action_e: QAction::Trigger);
3276 key_consumed = true;
3277 break; }
3278
3279#if QT_CONFIG(whatsthis)
3280 case Qt::Key_F1:
3281 if (!d->currentAction || d->currentAction->whatsThis().isNull())
3282 break;
3283 QWhatsThis::enterWhatsThisMode();
3284 d->activateAction(action: d->currentAction, action_e: QAction::Trigger);
3285 return;
3286#endif
3287 default:
3288 key_consumed = false;
3289 }
3290
3291 if (!key_consumed && (
3292 false
3293#ifndef QT_NO_SHORTCUT
3294 || e->matches(key: QKeySequence::Cancel)
3295#endif
3296#ifdef QT_KEYPAD_NAVIGATION
3297 || e->key() == Qt::Key_Back
3298#endif
3299 )) {
3300 key_consumed = true;
3301 if (d->tornoff) {
3302 close();
3303 return;
3304 }
3305 {
3306 QPointer<QWidget> caused = d->causedPopup.widget;
3307 d->hideMenu(menu: this); // hide after getting causedPopup
3308#if QT_CONFIG(menubar)
3309 if (QMenuBar *mb = qobject_cast<QMenuBar*>(object: caused)) {
3310 mb->d_func()->setCurrentAction(d->menuAction);
3311 mb->d_func()->setKeyboardMode(true);
3312 }
3313#endif
3314 }
3315 }
3316
3317 if (!key_consumed) { // send to menu bar
3318 if ((!e->modifiers() || e->modifiers() == Qt::AltModifier || e->modifiers() == Qt::ShiftModifier) &&
3319 e->text().size()==1) {
3320 bool activateAction = false;
3321 QAction *nextAction = nullptr;
3322 if (style()->styleHint(stylehint: QStyle::SH_Menu_KeyboardSearch, opt: nullptr, widget: this) && !e->modifiers()) {
3323 int best_match_count = 0;
3324 d->searchBufferTimer.start(msec: 2000, obj: this);
3325 d->searchBuffer += e->text();
3326 for(int i = 0; i < d->actions.size(); ++i) {
3327 int match_count = 0;
3328 if (d->actionRects.at(i).isNull())
3329 continue;
3330 QAction *act = d->actions.at(i);
3331 const QString act_text = act->text();
3332 for(int c = 0; c < d->searchBuffer.size(); ++c) {
3333 if (act_text.indexOf(c: d->searchBuffer.at(i: c), from: 0, cs: Qt::CaseInsensitive) != -1)
3334 ++match_count;
3335 }
3336 if (match_count > best_match_count) {
3337 best_match_count = match_count;
3338 nextAction = act;
3339 }
3340 }
3341 }
3342#ifndef QT_NO_SHORTCUT
3343 else {
3344 int clashCount = 0;
3345 QAction *first = nullptr, *currentSelected = nullptr, *firstAfterCurrent = nullptr;
3346 QChar c = e->text().at(i: 0).toUpper();
3347 for(int i = 0; i < d->actions.size(); ++i) {
3348 if (d->actionRects.at(i).isNull())
3349 continue;
3350 QAction *act = d->actions.at(i);
3351 QKeySequence sequence = QKeySequence::mnemonic(text: act->text());
3352 int key = sequence[0].toCombined() & 0xffff; // suspicious
3353 if (key == c.unicode()) {
3354 clashCount++;
3355 if (!first)
3356 first = act;
3357 if (act == d->currentAction)
3358 currentSelected = act;
3359 else if (!firstAfterCurrent && currentSelected)
3360 firstAfterCurrent = act;
3361 }
3362 }
3363 if (clashCount == 1)
3364 activateAction = true;
3365 if (clashCount >= 1) {
3366 if (clashCount == 1 || !currentSelected || !firstAfterCurrent)
3367 nextAction = first;
3368 else
3369 nextAction = firstAfterCurrent;
3370 }
3371 }
3372#endif
3373 if (nextAction) {
3374 key_consumed = true;
3375 if (d->scroll)
3376 d->scrollMenu(action: nextAction, location: QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollCenter, active: false);
3377 d->setCurrentAction(action: nextAction, popup: 0, reason: QMenuPrivate::SelectedFromElsewhere, activateFirst: true);
3378 if (!nextAction->menu() && activateAction) {
3379 d->setSyncAction();
3380 d->activateAction(action: nextAction, action_e: QAction::Trigger);
3381 }
3382 }
3383 }
3384 if (!key_consumed) {
3385#if QT_CONFIG(menubar)
3386 if (QMenuBar *mb = qobject_cast<QMenuBar*>(object: d->topCausedWidget())) {
3387 QAction *oldAct = mb->d_func()->currentAction;
3388 QCoreApplication::sendEvent(receiver: mb, event: e);
3389 if (mb->d_func()->currentAction != oldAct)
3390 key_consumed = true;
3391 }
3392#endif
3393 }
3394
3395#ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
3396 if (key_consumed && (e->key() == Qt::Key_Control || e->key() == Qt::Key_Shift || e->key() == Qt::Key_Meta))
3397 QApplication::beep();
3398#endif // Q_OS_WIN32
3399 }
3400 if (key_consumed)
3401 e->accept();
3402 else
3403 e->ignore();
3404}

3406/*!
3407 \reimp
3408*/
3409void QMenu::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
3410{
3411 Q_D(QMenu);
3412 if (!isVisible() || d->aboutToHide || d->mouseEventTaken(e))
3413 return;
3414
3415 d->motions++;
3416 if (!d->hasMouseMoved(globalPos: e->globalPosition().toPoint()))
3417 return;
3418
3419 d->hasHadMouse = d->hasHadMouse || rect().contains(p: e->position().toPoint());
3420
3421 QAction *action = d->actionAt(p: e->position().toPoint());
3422 if ((!action || action->isSeparator()) && !d->sloppyState.enabled()) {
3423 if (d->hasHadMouse
3424 || (!d->currentAction || !d->currentAction->menu() || !d->currentAction->menu()->isVisible())) {
3425 d->setCurrentAction(action);
3426 }
3427 return;
3428 }
3429
3430 if (e->buttons())
3431 QMenuPrivate::mouseDown = this;
3432
3433 if (d->activeMenu)
3434 d->activeMenu->d_func()->setCurrentAction(action: nullptr);
3435
3436 QMenuSloppyState::MouseEventResult sloppyEventResult = d->sloppyState.processMouseEvent(mousePos: e->position(), resetAction: action, currentAction: d->currentAction);
3437 if (sloppyEventResult == QMenuSloppyState::EventShouldBePropagated) {
3438 d->setCurrentAction(action, popup: d->mousePopupDelay);
3439 } else if (sloppyEventResult == QMenuSloppyState::EventDiscardsSloppyState) {
3440 d->sloppyState.reset();
3441 d->hideMenu(menu: d->activeMenu);
3442 }
3443}

3449{

3451 d->hasReceievedEnter = true;
3452 d->sloppyState.enter();
3453 d->motions = -1; // force us to ignore the generate mouse move in mouseMoveEvent()
3454}

3462 d->hasReceievedEnter = false;
3463 if (!d->activeMenu && d->currentAction)
3464 setActiveAction(nullptr);
3465}

3467/*!
3468 \reimp
3469*/
3470void
3471QMenu::timerEvent(QTimerEvent *e)
3472{
3473 Q_D(QMenu);
3474 if (d->scroll && d->scroll->scrollTimer.timerId() == e->timerId()) {
3475 d->scrollMenu(direction: (QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollDirection)d->scroll->scrollDirection);
3476 if (d->scroll->scrollFlags == QMenuPrivate::QMenuScroller::ScrollNone)
3477 d->scroll->scrollTimer.stop();
3478 } else if (d->delayState.timer.timerId() == e->timerId()) {
3479 if (d->currentAction && !d->currentAction->menu())
3480 return;
3481 d->delayState.stop();
3482 d->sloppyState.stopTimer();
3483 internalDelayedPopup();
3484 } else if (d->sloppyState.isTimerId(timerId: e->timerId())) {
3485 d->sloppyState.timeout();
3486 } else if (d->searchBufferTimer.timerId() == e->timerId()) {
3487 d->searchBuffer.clear();
3488 }
3489}

3491/*!
3492 \reimp
3493*/
3494void QMenu::actionEvent(QActionEvent *e)
3495{
3496 Q_D(QMenu);
3497 d->itemsDirty = 1;
3498 setAttribute(Qt::WA_Resized, on: false);
3499 if (d->tornPopup)
3500 d->tornPopup->syncWithMenu(menu: this, act: e);
3501 if (e->type() == QEvent::ActionAdded) {
3502
3503 if (!d->tornoff
3504#if QT_CONFIG(menubar)
3505 && !qobject_cast<QMenuBar*>(object: e->action()->parent())
3506#endif
3507 ) {
3508 // Only connect if the action was not directly added by QMenuBar::addAction(const QString &text)
3509 // to avoid the signal being emitted twice
3510 connect(sender: e->action(), SIGNAL(triggered()), receiver: this, SLOT(_q_actionTriggered()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
3511 connect(sender: e->action(), SIGNAL(hovered()), receiver: this, SLOT(_q_actionHovered()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
3512 }
3513 if (QWidgetAction *wa = qobject_cast<QWidgetAction *>(object: e->action())) {
3514 QWidget *widget = wa->requestWidget(parent: this);
3515 if (widget) {
3516 d->widgetItems.insert(key: wa, value: widget);
3517 if (d->scroll) {
3518 if (!d->scrollUpTearOffItem)
3519 d->scrollUpTearOffItem =
3520 new QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem(QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem::ScrollUp, d, this);
3521 if (!d->scrollDownItem)
3522 d->scrollDownItem =
3523 new QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem(QMenuPrivate::ScrollerTearOffItem::ScrollDown, d, this);
3524 }
3525 }
3526 }
3527 } else if (e->type() == QEvent::ActionRemoved) {
3528 e->action()->disconnect(receiver: this);
3529 if (e->action() == d->currentAction)
3530 d->currentAction = nullptr;
3531 if (QWidgetAction *wa = qobject_cast<QWidgetAction *>(object: e->action())) {
3532 if (QWidget *widget = d->widgetItems.value(key: wa))
3533 wa->releaseWidget(widget);
3534 }
3535 d->widgetItems.remove(key: static_cast<QAction *>(e->action()));
3536 }
3537
3538 if (!d->platformMenu.isNull()) {
3539 auto action = static_cast<QAction *>(e->action());
3540 if (e->type() == QEvent::ActionAdded) {
3541 QPlatformMenuItem *beforeItem = e->before()
3542 ? d->platformMenu->menuItemForTag(tag: reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(e->before()))
3543 : nullptr;
3544 d->insertActionInPlatformMenu(action, beforeItem);
3545 } else if (e->type() == QEvent::ActionRemoved) {
3546 QPlatformMenuItem *menuItem = d->platformMenu->menuItemForTag(tag: reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(e->action()));
3547 d->platformMenu->removeMenuItem(menuItem);
3548 delete menuItem;
3549 } else if (e->type() == QEvent::ActionChanged) {
3550 QPlatformMenuItem *menuItem = d->platformMenu->menuItemForTag(tag: reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(e->action()));
3551 if (menuItem) {
3552 d->copyActionToPlatformItem(action, item: menuItem);
3553 d->platformMenu->syncMenuItem(menuItem);
3554 }
3555 }
3556
3557 d->platformMenu->syncSeparatorsCollapsible(enable: d->collapsibleSeparators);
3558 }
3559
3560 if (isVisible()) {
3561 resize(sizeHint());
3562 update();
3563 }
3564}

3566/*!
3567 \internal
3568*/
3569void QMenu::internalDelayedPopup()
3570{
3571 Q_D(QMenu);
3572 //hide the current item
3573 if (QMenu *menu = d->activeMenu) {
3574 if (d->activeMenu->menuAction() != d->currentAction)
3575 d->hideMenu(menu);
3576 }
3577
3578 if (!d->currentAction || !d->currentAction->isEnabled() || !d->currentAction->menu() ||
3579 !d->currentAction->menu()->isEnabled() || d->currentAction->menu()->isVisible())
3580 return;
3581
3582 //setup
3583 d->activeMenu = d->currentAction->menu();
3584 d->activeMenu->d_func()->causedPopup.widget = this;
3585 d->activeMenu->d_func()->causedPopup.action = d->currentAction;
3586
3587 QRect screen;
3588#if QT_CONFIG(graphicsview)
3589 bool isEmbedded = !bypassGraphicsProxyWidget(p: this) && QMenuPrivate::nearestGraphicsProxyWidget(origin: this);
3590 if (isEmbedded)
3591 screen = d->popupGeometry();
3592 else
3593#endif
3594 screen = d->popupGeometry(screen: QGuiApplication::screenAt(point: pos()));
3595
3596 int subMenuOffset = style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_SubMenuOverlap, option: nullptr, widget: this);
3597 const QRect actionRect(d->actionRect(act: d->currentAction));
3598 QPoint subMenuPos(mapToGlobal(QPoint(actionRect.right() + subMenuOffset + 1, actionRect.top())));
3599 if (subMenuPos.x() > screen.right())
3600 subMenuPos.setX(geometry().left());
3601
3602 const auto &subMenuActions = d->activeMenu->actions();
3603 if (!subMenuActions.isEmpty()) {
3604 // Offset by the submenu's 1st action position to align with the current action
3605 const auto subMenuActionRect = d->activeMenu->actionGeometry(act: subMenuActions.first());
3606 subMenuPos.ry() -= subMenuActionRect.top();
3607 }
3608
3609 d->activeMenu->popup(p: subMenuPos);
3610 d->sloppyState.setSubMenuPopup(actionRect, resetAction: d->currentAction, subMenu: d->activeMenu);
3611
3612#if !defined(Q_OS_DARWIN)
3613 // Send the leave event to the current menu - only active popup menu gets
3614 // mouse enter/leave events. Currently Cocoa is an exception, so disable
3615 // it there to avoid event duplication.
3616 if (underMouse()) {
3617 QEvent leaveEvent(QEvent::Leave);
3618 QCoreApplication::sendEvent(receiver: this, event: &leaveEvent);
3619 }
3620#endif
3621}

3640/*!
3641 \fn void QMenu::triggered(QAction *action)
3642
3643 This signal is emitted when an action in this menu is triggered.
3644
3645 \a action is the action that caused the signal to be emitted.
3646
3647 Normally, you connect each menu action's \l{QAction::}{triggered()} signal
3648 to its own custom slot, but sometimes you will want to connect several
3649 actions to a single slot, for example, when you have a group of closely
3650 related actions, such as "left justify", "center", "right justify".
3651
3652 \note This signal is emitted for the main parent menu in a hierarchy.
3653 Hence, only the parent menu needs to be connected to a slot; sub-menus need
3654 not be connected.
3655
3656 \sa hovered(), QAction::triggered()
3657*/
